website_summaries.verdict: Supra replenishes their product lineup with a rendition of their Stacks series and reintroduces the vulcanized interpretation as the Supra Stacks Vulc II. The vulcanized modification, designed for skaters, offers more flex, lighter comfort and great board feel as compared to a cup sole construct, which could also benefit non-skaters.Although it is marketed as a skate shoe, it is advised to use as a casual shoe to get more extended use and your money's worth. Finally, users favor this kick for its breathability, comfort, sleek style and budget-friendly price.
pros: The Supra Stacks Vulc II is offered in an extensive choice of colorways, prompting some consumers to buy the pair in varying hues
Several reviewers agree that the kick is stylish with a sleek and smart appeal
Most wearers find the pair to fit true to size
A number of practical customers were delighted at the shoe's versatile design as it pairs well with a multitude of casual outfits
Majority of the commenters were happy with the Supra Stacks Vulc II's adequate comfort
A significant number of shoe users appreciate this sneaker's lightweight yet durable construction
Some added that despite its lightweight the shoe holds up great as casual footwear
Some wide-footed consumers were pleasantly surprised with the pair's ample room
A few wearers were pleased that they receive compliments whenever they wear this kick out
A number of shoe users claim that the kick has excellent grip
A handful of reviewers find the Supra Stacks Vulc II to be a great product with excellent value for money
cons: Some skateboarders said that it wears out quickly when used for skateboarding

customer_reviews.title: Functional shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Fits petfectly. I got a kind of abnormal color scheme as they were on sale for a very good deal, but they are good looking shoes and confortable.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: upper separates from lower
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are comfortable, but I have two major complaints which will probably prevent me from buying again: 1) (the biggest) the right sole (bottom white part) is separating from the black part when I take off my shoes. It's only glued on so there's nothing holding the black part into the white part short of that. 2) the laces are ridiculously long for these shoes. I see no reason why they have to be so long. I can live w/ that, but #1- not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Navy_rock

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I think I got the sizing a little off on mine ended up being a size smaller but i kept these all the same and they've lasted me a year already of skating to my campus everyday. Love them
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: Easily some of the best shoes I've ever purchased. They felt broken in right out of the box. The material is perfect, and almost felt as if I were walking on clouds. I almost want to only buy these shoes from now on in different colors. Is that weird?
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Love skate shoes made by skaters!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes never disappoint. On my third pair and I even had a couple pairs while I had these, and especially when these break in they are incomparable to how nice they are. They have a great grip, they last long, durable, have nice insoles, and are freakin stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Color is true to pic
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE SHOES! They are comfortable, good quality and great price. I like the color. It looks just like the photo
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Vega

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, really sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve actually never bought Supra brand until now but these are super sturdy and last a long time. I’m going to buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Kale

customer_reviews.title: Noice
customer_reviews.text: great option if you’re looking for a pair of office sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: sunny undies

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Got the correct size and color that was sold out on Supras website. They were shipped quick & not overpriced being sold out. They fit good like all my past Supras and I especially love these new inserts.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Supra puts out some of the most comfortable shoes out there
customer_reviews.text: Supra puts out some of the most comfortable shoes out there. Perfect sizing, looks great, and I can spend a full day of walking around in them with no pain.
customer_reviews.author: ARTHUR

customer_reviews.title: Too much room for your toes
customer_reviews.text: There is too much toe room, when I wear these it feels like clown shoes since there is so much empty space in the tips of the shoes.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. I sprayed a water resistant spray on them ...
customer_reviews.text: I have received many compliments on these shoes. Very comfortable. I sprayed a water resistant spray on them as soon as I got them. Spilled water on them the other day, but it came right off. Wearing them now.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Supra are my ish
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is quality. The color is not what you would think. Overall.good shoe
customer_reviews.author: Timothy kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Great Casual/Semi-Formal Wear
customer_reviews.text: Great tonal look with a combination of materials. Very comfortable. My only issue is that it fits slightly larger than I expected, as I own other Supras of the same size, and those fit more closely. Great shoes, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shamar G.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like the cushion of the shoe, but the overall look of the body is great!
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I don't skate, but out of all shoes, this type are the most comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel M. Canales

customer_reviews.title: ... yet (snow on the ground 😭) but they are super comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't skated in them yet (snow on the ground 😭) but they are super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: M Web

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes, runs SLIGHTLY large.
customer_reviews.text: I own another pair of Supras in the same size, but for some reason these feel a little bigger. Nothing that made me send it back as they are still very comfortable but there is definitely some more room in these compared to my other pair.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Villani

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. The box came destroyed and the shoes are both missing the shoe strings.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are awesome and fit so well. Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Supra
customer_reviews.text: It was better than the picture and it was a Christmas gift!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kicks
customer_reviews.text: Clean looking shoes. They come with really good sole inserts .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Rated 4 due to the fact then arrived with black lines on the side of the shoe...
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Franklin

customer_reviews.title: awesome!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: i think they are great they hold up very well ive had them for about three months
customer_reviews.author: Ryker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my son in law. He is very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

product_meta.title: Supra Unisex Adults’ Stacks Vulc Ii Low-Top Sneakers
product_meta.description: A new, slimmer cut has been given to the ground-breaking low top in contemporary skate shoe design. Its vulcanised sole provides better grip and a classic board-feeling.
feature_bullets: Wear them with everything from shorts to chinos whether you're riding or walking.
